mapper.insert: insert into ProductVo (category_code, member_nickname, product_name, product_price, product_capa, delivery_company ) values(#{category_code}, #{member_nickname}, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_capa}, #{delivery_company} )

insert into ProductInfoVo (product_idx, product_info_amount, product_info_useMethod, product_info_maker, product_info_handphone ) values(#{product_idx}, #{product_info_amount}, #{product_info_useMethod}, #{product_info_maker}, #{product_info_handphone} )
mapper.select: select * from product where product_name = #{product_name} AND member_nickname = #{member_nickname};
